titleStmt.title: An Humble address to the truly loyal citizens of London by a true lover of his king and countrey ; with a candid reprehension to the Intelligencer at the Stationers Arms in the Piazza under the Royal Exchange in Cornhil.
titleStmt.author: True lover of his king and countrey.
